title: DV_STATE
description:
For representing state values which obey a defined state machine, such as a variable  representing the states of an instruction or care process. 

DV_STATE is expressed as a String but its values are driven by archetype-defined  state machines. This provides a powerful way of capturing stateful complex processes  in simple data.
$comments: Defined in Data_types IM, inherits from DATA_VALUE

value.description: The state name. State names are determined by a state/event table defined in archetypes, and coded using openEHR Terminology or local archetype terms, as specified by the archetype.

is_terminal.description: Indicates whether this state is a terminal state, such as  "aborted",  "completed" etc. from which no further transitions are possible.
